00030 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00031 {

00035 
00036   if (argc < 2) {
00037     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] mcstate"
00038             "\n   -n NMAX       oscillator cut off"
00039             "\n   -o OMEGA      Oscillator constant [MeV]\n",

00051     switch (c) {
00052     case 'n':
00053       nmax = atoi(optarg);
00054       break;
00055     case 'o':
00056       omega = atof(optarg)/hbc;
00057       break;

00069 
00070   if (readMulticonfigfile(mcstatefile, &mbfile, &P, &Q, &S, &E, &n)) {
00071     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for reading\n", mcstatefile);
00072     exit(-1);
00073   }
00074 
00075   if (omega == 0.0) {
00076     fprintf(stderr, "You have to provide a oscillator parameter\n");
00077     exit(-1);
00078   }
00079 
00080   // density matrix
00081 
00082   DensityMatrixHOPar DMpar = {

00084     omega : omega,

00087 
00088   int i;
00089   int a,b;
00090 
00091   initHOBasis(nmax);
00092   initOpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO(&DMpar);
00093 
00094   void* dmme[n*n];
00095 
00096   // read or calculate matrix elements
00097 
00098   for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00099     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00100       dmme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO);
00101 
00102           if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &P,
00103                                         &OpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO, S[a], S[b],
00104                                         dmme[a+b*n])) {
00105             calcprojectedMBME(&P, &OpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO, &Q[a], &Q[b],
00106                               S[a], S[b], dmme[a+b*n]);

00108                                      &OpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO, S[a], S[b],

00111     }
